alert.note: Alert for Broward (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 1:25PM EDT until June 03 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Broward County in southeastern Florida... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 125 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Port Everglades, or near Fort Lauderdale, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, Tamarac, Lauderdale-By-The-Sea and Oakland Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
